div.p: The full list of supported search parameters are can be accessed at DAF Requestor conformance expectations and DAF Responder conformance expectations.
The following are example usage scenarios for the DiagnosticReport profile:

ul.li: Query for diagnostic reports belonging to a Patient
Query for all patients who have had a specific diagnostic test report

div.p: There is no additional profile specific implementation guidance, please refer to DAF FHIR IG for implementation guidance common to all profiles.
